Align Content

# Align Content

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support        |
| ----------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
content-center
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
content-start
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
content-end
```     | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
content-between
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
content-around
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
content-evenly
```  | ✅ Full Support |
